basic_info.name: AALIMEC Chennai Admission 2024
description: 1. BE Admission- Candidates seeking admission in B.Tech need to qualify TNEA. TNEA is conducted by Anna University for admission to UG courses at the colleges in Tamil Nadu. The university releases a merit list based on candidates 10+2 marks and the candidates need to appear for counseling.

basic_info.name: AALIMEC Chennai Placement 2023
description: There is always separate placement authority in the Institute to take care of Placement progress with training programs and events organized among its students every year.

Some of the top recruiters are Accenture, Wipro, Infosys, HCL, HP, Blue star, Cognizant, Infosys, L&T, TCS, BOSCH, and many more, Here is given below a few records of the previous year placed students in several companies.

Section.name: About AALIMEC
Section.description:
Aalim Muhammed Salegh College of Engineering (AALIMEC) is a private engineering college established in 1990 at Chennai, Tamil Nadu. It is affiliated to Anna University, Chennai, and is approved by AICTE. It helps in imparting career-oriented courses to all its students to acquire knowledge and skills and converts them into true professionals as per International and National Standards. AALIMEC Chennai offers B.E. across six specializations.
Table of Content


Following are the courses offered by Aalim Muhammed Salegh College of Engineering, Tamil Nadu:
Course 1: Bachelor of Engineering (B.E)
Course 2: Bachelor of Engineering (Lateral)
Read more AALIMEC Chennai courses & Fees
1. BE Admission- Candidates seeking admission in B.Tech need to qualify TNEA. TNEA is conducted by Anna University for admission to UG courses at the colleges in Tamil Nadu. The university releases a merit list based on candidates 10+2 marks and the candidates need to appear for counseling.
TNEA Application Procedure:
Read more AALIMEC Chennai Admission
There is always separate placement authority in the Institute to take care of Placement progress with training programs and events organized among its students every year.
Some of the top recruiters are Accenture, Wipro, Infosys, HCL, HP, Blue star, Cognizant, Infosys, L&T, TCS, BOSCH, and many more, Here is given below a few records of the previous year placed students in several companies.

Read more AALIMEC Chennai Hostel
Ques: Is there any scholarship available?
Ans: Yes, there are Govt. scholarships for SC/ST/ BC students, minority scholarships and more
Ques: Does AALIMEC Chennai provide accommodation?
Ans: Yes, there are hostel facilities for boys and girls
Ques: Can I apply for TNEA offline?
Ans: Fill the TNEA application form, attach it with all the required documents and send it to the following address before the deadline
The Secretary
Tamil Nadu Engineering Admissions
Anna University
Chennai – 600025
